practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Wrongful Death|Trucking Accidents|Brain Injury|Birth Injury
description:
Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys is dedicated to giving people in Tigard, Oregon, the legal counsel they need to file for bankruptcy and start over confidently. For several decades, our law firm has been there to educate clients on their options for debt relief. In some cases, we are able to help them eliminate debt completely via liquidation. In others, we help them keep certain assets and restructure payments into a manageable plan.

We are also committed to protecting our clients from harassment during the bankruptcy process, whether they are filing for Chapter 7, Chapter 11, Chapter 12 or Chapter 13. Michael Fuller, partner and chair of our consumer protection group, has extensive experience standing up to unfair corporate practices pertaining to credit reports, class actions, collections, mortgages, student loans and landlord-tenant matters.

In addition to overseeing bankruptcies and protecting consumers, our law firm handles select personal injury cases. We represent victims and families affected by:

  • Trucking accidents
  • Car crashes
  • Brain injuries
  • Birth injuries
  • Wrongful deaths

Either in negotiation or litigation, we advocate for clients against callous insurance companies. Our attorneys work to obtain comprehensive compensation for medical bills, funeral expenses, lost wages, limited earning potential and all future recovery costs.

Regardless of what brings people to our law firm, we offer a free initial consultation to prospective clients statewide and those from the Tri-County area of Washington. For utmost expediency, Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys is pleased to accept credit cards as payment.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
